item.title: CVE-2022-3480|2024-08-03T01:14:01.485Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%20centerport
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker could cause a denial-of-service of PHOENIX CONTACT FL MGUARD and TC MGUARD devices below version 8.9.0 by sending a larger number of unauthenticated HTTPS connections originating from different source IPâ€™s. Configuring firewall limits for incoming connections cannot prevent the issue.
